Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: touch
Description: Change file access and modification times

Arguments.Name: A
Arguments.Description: Adjust the access and modification time stamps for the file by the specified value

Arguments.Name: a
Arguments.Description: Change the access time of the file

Arguments.Name: c
Arguments.Description: Do not create the file if it does not exist

Arguments.Name: f
Arguments.Description: Attempt to force the update, even if the file permissions do not currently permit it

Arguments.Name: h
Arguments.Description: If the file is a symbolic link, change the times of the link itself rather than the file that the link points to

Arguments.Name: m
Arguments.Description: Change the modification time of the file

Arguments.Name: r
Arguments.Description: Use the access and modifications times from the specified file instead of the current time of day

Arguments.Name: t
Arguments.Description: Change the access and modification times to the specified time instead of the current time of day
